channel.title: CVE Feed for magepeopleteam -- Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for magepeopleteam -- Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation

item.title: CVE-2023-4067|2024-08-02T07:17:10.961Z -- magepeopleteam -- bus%20ticket%20booking%20with%20seat%20reservation
item.description: The Bus Ticket Booking with Seat Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tab_date' and 'tab_date_r' parameters in versions up to, and including, 5.2.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
